about.title: About FindPharma
about.subtitle: Our mission is to make medicine access easier for everyone in Cameroon
about.missionText: FindPharma was created to solve a major problem: the difficulty of finding medicines in Cameroon. We connect patients with pharmacies that have the medicines they need, in real time.
about.story2023Text: After seeing many people struggle to find their medicines, our team decided to create a digital solution.
about.story2024Text: Development of the platform with geolocation features, real-time search, and price comparison.
about.story2025Text: Deployment across all major cities in Cameroon, with hundreds of partner pharmacies.
about.valueAccessibilityDesc: Making medicine search simple and accessible to everyone, everywhere.
about.valueReliabilityDesc: Accurate and real-time information on medicine availability.
about.valueInnovationDesc: Using technology to solve real healthcare problems.
about.valueTransparencyDesc: Clear prices and verified information on all medicines.
about.teamMember1Desc: Expert in React user interface development and responsive design
about.teamMember2Desc: Technical lead and backend architect, specialized in Django and REST APIs
about.teamMember3Desc: Specialized in user experience and modern frontend development
about.teamMember4Desc: Expert in Django backend development and database management
about.teamMember5Desc: Frontend developer passionate about modern web technologies
about.ctaText: Whether you're a pharmacy or a patient, FindPharma is here for you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about FindPharma
faq.a1: FindPharma allows you to search for medicines by name. The platform displays all pharmacies that have the medicine in stock, sorted by distance from your location. You can compare prices and add medicines to your cart.
faq.a2: Yes, FindPharma is completely free for patients. You can search for medicines, check prices, and make reservations without any charges.
faq.q3: How do I know if a pharmacy has my medicine?
faq.a3: Pharmacies update their stock in real time on our platform. When you see a medicine listed at a pharmacy, it means it's currently available. However, we recommend calling to confirm before traveling.
faq.a4: Yes, once you've found your medicine, you can add it to your cart and reserve it. The pharmacy will hold it for you for 24 hours.
faq.a5: After your reservation, you'll receive a confirmation with the pharmacy's details. You have 24 hours to pick up your medicine. The pharmacy may contact you to confirm.
faq.a6: Prices are provided directly by pharmacies and updated regularly. However, they may vary slightly. We recommend confirming the final price when picking up your medicine.
faq.a7: By default, pharmacies are sorted by distance from your location (closest first). You can also sort by price or rating.
faq.q8: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a8: No account is required to search for medicines. However, to make reservations, view your order history, or save your favorites, you'll need to create a free account.
faq.q9: How do I become a partner pharmacy?
faq.a9: If you own a pharmacy and want to join FindPharma, contact us via our contact form or call us. We'll guide you through the registration process.
faq.a10: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All your personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your data with third parties without your consent.
faq.a11: FindPharma is currently available in Yaoundé, Douala, Bafoussam, Bamenda, and Garoua. We're constantly expanding to new cities.
faq.a12: You can contact us via our contact form, email us at contact@findpharma.cm, or message us on Facebook. We respond within 24 hours.
faq.orEmail: or send us an email at

legal.title: Legal Notice & Terms of Use
legal.subtitle: Legal information and terms of use of FindPharma
legal.section1Text: FindPharma is a digital platform operated by FindPharma SARL, a company registered in the Cameroon Commercial and Credit Registry. Our service allows users to locate medicines in partner pharmacies and facilitate their acquisition.
legal.section2Text: FindPharma SARL - Head office: Yaoundé, Cameroon - Email: contact@findpharma.cm - Phone: +237 XXX XXX XXX
legal.section3Text: The FindPharma site is hosted by [Host name] - Address: [Full address] - Contact: [Email and phone]
legal.section4Text1: Using FindPharma implies full acceptance of these terms of use. These conditions may be modified at any time, users will be informed of any significant changes.
legal.section4Text2: To access certain features (reservation, history), you must create an account by providing accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for keeping your login credentials confidential.
legal.section4Text3: You agree to use FindPharma responsibly and lawfully. It is prohibited to: Provide false information - Impersonate another person - Use the service for fraudulent purposes - Attempt to access other users' accounts
legal.section5Text1: We collect the following data: Account information (name, email, phone) - Location data (to find nearby pharmacies) - Search and reservation history - Connection data (IP address, browser)
legal.section5Text2: Your data is used only to: Provide and improve our services - Process your reservations - Send you important notifications - Analyze service usage to improve it
legal.section5Text3: We never sell your personal data. Your information may be shared with: Partner pharmacies (only to process your reservations) - Technical service providers (hosting, maintenance) - Legal authorities (if required by law)
legal.section5Text4: In accordance with data protection laws, you have the right to: Access your personal data - Correct or update your information - Delete your account and data - Withdraw your consent at any time - To exercise these rights, contact us at: contact@findpharma.cm
legal.section6Text1: FindPharma strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information on medicine availability and prices. However, we cannot guarantee absolute accuracy of this information which depends on updates from partner pharmacies.
legal.section6Text2: We strive to keep the service accessible 24/7, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted availability. Scheduled maintenance may require temporary service interruption.
legal.section6Text3: FindPharma acts as an intermediary between users and pharmacies. We are not responsible for: The quality of medicines sold by pharmacies - Pharmacy dispensing errors - Delays in reservation preparation - Conflicts between users and pharmacies
legal.section7Text: The content of FindPharma (texts, images, logos, design) is protected by copyright and belongs to FindPharma SARL or its partners. Any reproduction, distribution or commercial use without authorization is prohibited.
legal.section8Text: FindPharma uses cookies to improve your user experience. These cookies allow us to: Remember your preferences - Analyze site traffic - Personalize your experience - You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect certain features.
legal.section9Text: FindPharma reserves the right to modify these terms of use at any time. Users will be informed of significant changes by email or notification on the site.
legal.section10Text: These terms are governed by Cameroonian law. In case of dispute, the courts of Yaoundé will have sole jurisdiction.
legal.section11Text: For any questions regarding this legal notice or terms of use: Email: contact@findpharma.cm - Phone: +237 XXX XXX XXX - Facebook: FindPharma Cameroon
